text: Loimaa is a town (countryside city) in Southwest Finland. As of January 31, 2014, about 16,700 people lived there. Neighbouring municipalities are Huittinen, Humppila, Koski Tl, Marttila, Oripää, Punkalaidun, Pöytyä, Somero, Säkylä and Ypäjä. ==Distances== * Helsinki 150 km * Turku 65 km * Tampere 100 km * Hämeenlinna 106 km * Pori 112 km Distances to smaller municipalities are lot smaller. ==Other websites== * Official city site Category:Towns in Finland Category:Municipalities of Southwest Finland
title: Loimaa
